panels.description: This is the current total of living queues (started queue processes). These queues might be in an online or an offline state (ie. belong to an online or offline client).
panels.title: Queues Processes

panels.description: Current rate per second of received MQTT PUBLISH frames by the broker.

panels.description: Current rate per second of sent MQTT PUBLISH frames by the broker.
panels.title: Current MQTT send rate

panels.description: VerneMQ Broker average Erlang Scheduler utilization.
